PerfectNetExp.abs: 一份无... ... 22。patrician n. 贵族 23。prudish adj. 装正经的, 过分规矩的, 24。supercilious adj. 自大的, 傲慢的, 目空一切的.
蓝宝词典 ... prudent adj. 审慎的，精明的，节俭的 prudish adj. 装淑女样子的，过分规矩的 prune n. 梅干；深紫红色；傻瓜v.修剪.
GRE分类词汇记忆8 - 小马过河 ... prude n. 过分守礼的人 prudish adj. 过分守礼的，假道学的 underbid v. 要价过低.
GRE分类词汇总结&nbsp;下... ... 伪善的,伪善者的 hypocrisy n． 过分守礼,假正经 prudish adj． 假名,笔名 toupee n．.

list.abs: Perhaps it was too prudish ., 我这也许太拘谨了.
the state or quality of being prudish ., 过分拘谨过分拘谨的状态或品质.
America ' s journalists can be a little prudish ., 美国的新闻记者可能会有些古板.
Americans retain a strong prudish streak ., 美国人保留着一种强烈的假正经的倾向.

entry.tran: （在性问题上）大惊小怪的，过分正经的；谈性色变的
entry.def: If you describe someone as prudish, you mean that they are too easily shocked by things relating to sex.

example.ex: I'm not prudish but I think these photographs are obscene.
example.tran: 我并不是假正经的人，但我觉得这些照片非常淫秽。

sentences.sentence: "my straitlaced Aunt Anna doesn't approve of my miniskirts"

auth_sentence.content: For a pleasure-loving, hard-drinking barfly, my wife's father was surprisingly prudish.
auth_sentence.res_content: For a pleasure-loving, hard-drinking barfly, my wife's father was surprisingly prudish.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For a pleasure-loving, hard-drinking barfly, my wife's father was surprisingly prudish.

auth_sentence.content: People tend to be very prudish, timid, almost witch-hunter-esk when it comes to debating the topic.
auth_sentence.res_content: People tend to be very prudish, timid, almost witch-hunter-esk when it comes to debating the topic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: People tend to be very prudish, timid, almost witch-hunter-esk when it comes to debating the topic.
